summary.span: 命名空间对采用应用程序扩展保护的身份验证提供支持。

span.span: The namespace provides support for authentication using extended protection for applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此设计的集成 Windows 身份验证 (IWA) 允许某些凭据质询响应是通用的这意味着可以重新使用或转发。The design of Integrated Windows Authentication (IWA) allows for some credential challenge responses to be universal, meaning they can be re-used or forwarded. 如果不需要此特定设计功能然后的质询响应应为使用构造的在最小值、 目标特定信息并，在最好的情况，还某些通道的特定信息。If this particular design feature is not needed then the challenge responses should be constructed with, at minimum, target specific information and, at best, also some channel specific information. 然后，服务可以提供扩展的保护，以确保凭据的质询响应包含服务特定信息 （服务提供程序名称或 SPN） 以及，如有必要，通道特定信息 （通道绑定令牌或 CBT）。Services can then provide extended protection to ensure that credential challenge responses contain service specific information (a Service Provider Name or SPN) and, if necessary, channel specific information (a channel binding token or CBT). 使用此信息的凭据交换中，服务将能够更好地防止恶意使用的凭据可能不正确获得的质询响应。With this information in the credential exchanges, services are able to better protect against malicious use of credential challenge responses that might have been improperly obtained.
